title: [Large-Scale] Knowledge Recommendation System Utilization Strategies for Workplace Learning Support

context.prior_knowledge: Basic job-related knowledge and experience in using digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Practitioners experience methods to enhance work efficiency using knowledge recommendation systems in informal workplace learning environments through simulations/VR

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operating principles of personalized knowledge recommendation systems tailored to job contexts
Learners can formulate work problem-solving strategies using knowledge recommendation systems in simulation/VR environments
Learners can diagnose learning attitudes and develop improvement plans reflecting feedback from recommendation systems
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
